text: Luis Leonardo Almagro Lemes (; born June 1, 1963) is a Uruguayan lawyer and politician. He is the 10th Secretary General of the Organization of American States (OAS) since 2015. He also was Minister of Foreign Affairs between 2010 and 2015, during the Presidency of Jos√© Mujica. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan politicians Category:Uruguayan lawyers Category:Secretaries General of the Organization of American States
title: Luis Almagro
